channel.title: [PI] Loading models
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make the server load the models quicker in anyway? When I load up the client, it takes around 1-3 minutes to load the models, and used to go through the CMD saying "Directory Exists". I deleted that bit since it annoyed me, but does anyone know how to speed up the loading time of the client?
Any help will be appreciated.
